personalInfo.name: Raji Sattanathan
personalInfo.title: Software Quality Assurance Engineer
personalInfo.bio: Manual Tester with 3.3 years of experience in software testing, specializing in identifying and resolving software defects to ensure high-quality product delivery. Expertise in Manual Testing across various domains, with a solid understanding of the Software Testing Life Cycle (STLC), defect life cycle, and test methodologies. Skilled in API testing using tools like Postman, mobile testing through BrowserStack, and defect management using tools like JIRA. Proficient in creating detailed test cases, test scenarios, and test reports while ensuring comprehensive test coverage. Hands-on experience working in Agile-Scrum environments, actively participating in sprint planning, daily stand-ups, reviews, and retrospectives. Adept at functional testing, regression testing, and collaborating with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless software delivery. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with a focus on maintaining data accuracy, consistency, and meeting deadlines

projects.title: Delta SFDC Account Lifecycle
projects.description: The SkyMiles Business Customers and Delta Pro Customers Project aims to streamline customer account management by identifying and flagging duplicate accounts in the system. The project ensures that duplicate accounts are detected and flagged under the 'Potential Duplicate' object, preventing redundancy and maintaining data integrity

projects.title: Professional Locator
projects.description: The Find a Professional Locator Landing Page project involves developing a user-friendly web interface to help users locate qualified professionals based on their specific needs and location. The landing page integrates search filters, maps, and contact details to provide an efficient and personalized user experience. This project aims to enhance accessibility and streamline the process of connecting users with professionals across various domains

projects.title: PIM DAM API Migration
projects.description: LGEUS - The website is for Heater, ventilator and Air conditioner. My roles and responsibilities in this project is to validate After the data is migrated between the two systems, it should function in the same way as the existing process.

projects.title: DXP Data Migration
projects.description: The DXP Data Migration project focuses on transitioning data from legacy systems to a modern Digital Experience Platform (DXP) to improve digital capabilities and user engagement. The process involves extracting, transforming, and loading data while ensuring its accuracy, consistency, and security throughout the migration. By leveraging DXP's advanced features, the project aims to deliver personalized experiences and streamline business workflows

projects.title: MYVISITMAKER
projects.description: MYVISITMAKER is a salon website (Product based application) provides service for Partners, stylists and customer for Booking appointment in salon

projects.title: Edio
projects.description: Edio(Education for Individualized Outcomes) is CCA's relationship management system (RMS). It was designed by CCA teachers, parents, staff, and students to provide a personalized learning experience unique to CCA.

projects.title: Women Safety App
projects.description: The main purpose of this app is to provide a safe platform through Android phone as today all person is taking Smart Phones to travel here and there. The user also gets to know the current user address using GPS location tracker. The fetched information is sent to the emergency contact of the user.

experience.title: Software Quality Assurance Engineer
experience.description: Dedicated and detail-oriented Manual Tester with 3.1 years of experience in quality assurance and software testing. Proven track record of ensuring the functionality, reliability, and performance of software applications. Adept at creating and executing test cases, identifying defects, and collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software.

experience.title: Quality Analyst - Manual Tester
experience.description: As a quality analyst, my aim is to ensure that products meet or exceed the required standards of quality. I will achieve this by planning and conducting tests, monitoring product quality, and collaborating with other members of the development team.

experience.title: QA Analyst - Manual Tester
experience.description: Involved in test analysis, test case creation, test execution, raised defects, traceability matrix, regression testing and all participated in all Agile methodologies.

education.institution: Rose Mary College Of Arts & Science, Tirunelveli
